 Broadway performances start on March 27 at the Majestic Theatre.
dtliExcerpt: James Monroe Iglehart brings his considerable charm and vocal prowess to the role of Louis Armstrong, anchoring this biographical musical with warmth and authenticity.

rejectionReasoning: claude: This is a website error message with navigation elements and promotional content, not a review.; openai: This is a navigation prompt and not a review.; gemini: This is an error message, not a review.; kimi: This is a website error page ('It seems we can't find what you're looking for') with search suggestions, not a theater review. It contains no evaluative content about a Broadway show.
